700701f-b.text:
3308 Campbell Drive, east side, between Stadium Ave., and Agar Place, showing the Campbell Mansion. The rear of the house overlooks
Eastchester Bay.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing the rear of the house as viewed from the shore
of Eastchester Bay.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
